about_the_game:
Discover more mysteries, myths, and hidden secrets in "Mystery of Myths: Heart of Athens". Take your journey through ancient Athens to the next level with this thrilling DLC! Dive deeper into the world of Greek legends with four new locations, filled with hidden objects to find, challenging puzzles to solve, and fascinating myths to uncover. This DLC expands the adventure with more collectibles, achievements, and a captivating story centered around a mysterious talisman. Are you ready for the ultimate test of your investigative skills?

Test your wits with unique and challenging brain-teasers that deepen the story and expand your understanding of Greek mythology. Delve deeper into the world of myths, legendary creatures, and ancient secrets that blur the line between fact and fiction!

🗝️ UNCOVER THE MYSTERY OF THE TALISMAN!

Search the room of the cult’s leader and discover a powerful artifact shrouded in mystery. Solve engaging mini-games to unlock its secrets and uncover vital information that could change everything!

🗝️ EXPLORE THE GORGON’S LAIR!

Step into the house of Medusa Gorgon, the legendary and deadly mythological figure. Search every corner of her home for hidden objects, unravel its secrets, and discover the truth behind her terrifying legend!

🗝️ LEARN THE TRUTH ABOUT HARPIES!

Are these mythical creatures as dangerous as the legends say? Visit the Museum of Greek Legends and Myths to delve into the mysteries of harpies, solve intricate riddles, and expand your knowledge of these winged monsters!

🗝️ SEARCH MAGNUS’ LABORATORY!

Explore the lab of Magnus, the enigmatic leader of the Argonauts. Discover his studies on runes, mythical creatures, and other ancient secrets that will bring you closer to understanding the mysteries surrounding Athens!

This DLC is packed with content that builds on the original game, offering an even richer experience for those who love to solve the mystery and uncover secrets hidden in the shadows of ancient Greece. The fate of Athens is in your hands—will you rise to the challenge?
